summary.span: 表示 对象的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使你能够执行命中测试、剪辑和擦除笔划等功能。The enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes. 控件将执行这些函数中的许多功能，但如果需要更多的控制，而不是 提供的，则 会提供更多选项。The control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the provides, the offers more options. 下表列出了在何处可以了解如何在自定义控件上管理数字墨迹。The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control. |要执行此操作 ...To do this…|参考文章See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |创建用于收集数字墨迹的控件Create a control that collects digital ink|[创建墨迹输入控件Creating an Ink Input Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control)| |创建允许用户选择墨迹的控件Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[如何：从自定义控件选择墨迹How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-select-ink-from-a-custom-control)| |创建允许用户使用点擦除墨迹的控件Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[如何：清除自定义控件上的墨迹How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control)| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values |术语Term|DefinitionDefinition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|一个字符串，表示以64编码的墨迹序列化格式（ISF）表示的笔画。A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 中的墨迹复制到另一 上。The following example demonstrates how to copy the ink in one onto another . 此示例假定：This example assumes: - 有两个称为 `inkCanvas1` 和 `inkCanvas2`的 对象。There are two objects called `inkCanvas1` and `inkCanvas2`. - 事件已连接到事件处理程序。The event has been connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StrokeCollectionMethods#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StrokeCollectionMethods/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#21)] [!code-vb[StrokeCollectionMethods#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StrokeCollectionMethods/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件，这是在派生类中处理事件的首选方法。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true``applyToStylusTip` 时， 方法会影响触笔笔尖的形状以及描边的位置。When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes. 例如，如果将 旋转90度，则笔划将在轴上移动，并且笔划的高度和宽度将显示为反转。For example, if you rotate a 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何移动 上的所有笔画。The following example demonstrates how to move all the strokes on an . 此示例假定存在一个名为 `inkCanvas1`的 。This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1`.
